scripts.build:wasm-mt: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg-parallel -- -Z build-std=panic_abort,std
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:wasm && webpack build ./wasm_exec.js --mode production -o dist --output-filename wasm_exec.js && cp wasm_exec.html dist/
